description:
Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami`s zombie wedding before it`s too late!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Food, Nami, and Shadows!! Luffy`s Enraged Counterattack!
L`essentiel à sauver : La bouffe, Nami, nos ombres. La contre-attaque rageuse de Luffy
Meshi to Nami to Kage!! Luffy Ikari no Daihangeki
Еда, Нами и тени! Яростная контратака Луффи!
メシとナミと影!! ルフィ怒りの大反撃
